title: Why is my phone rebooting randomly while is in use or even without use it?
content:
Hello,

Besides the issue with battery draining caused by Android 10 upgrade, my device is restarting randomly without notice, when it is in use or not.

I have reseted and reinstalled system using factory images, but that didn't fix the problem. Only installing Android 9 do the trick.

Why it is happening and when will Google fix this?
